verses.verse: Then he made<WH6213> an altar<WH4196> of brass,<WH5178> twenty<WH6242> cubits<WH520> its length,<WH753> and twenty<WH6242> cubits<WH520> its breadth,<WH7341> and ten<WH6235> cubits<WH520> its height.<WH6967>

Also he made<WH6213> the molten<WH3332> sea<WH3220> of ten<WH6235> cubits<WH520> from brim<WH8193> to brim,<WH8193> round<WH5696> in compass;<WH5439> and its height<WH6967> was five<WH2568> cubits;<WH520> and a line<WH6957> of thirty<WH7970> cubits<WH520> encircled<WH5437> it.<WH5439>

Under it was the likeness<WH1823> of oxen,<WH1241> which encircled<WH5437> it,<WH5439> for ten<WH6235> cubits,<WH520> encircling<WH5362> the<WH5439> sea.<WH3220> The oxen<WH1241> were in two<WH8147> rows,<WH2905> cast<WH3332> when it was cast.<WH3332>

It stood<WH5975> on twelve<WH8147> oxen,<WH1241> three<WH7969> looking<WH6437> toward the north,<WH6828> and three<WH7969> looking<WH6437> toward the west,<WH3220> and three<WH7969> looking<WH6437> toward the south,<WH5045> and three<WH7969> looking<WH6437> toward the east:<WH4217> and the sea<WH3220> was set on them above,<WH4605> and all their hinder parts<WH268> were inward.<WH1004>

It was a handbreadth<WH2947> thick;<WH5672> and its brim<WH8193> was worked<WH4639> like the brim<WH8193> of a cup,<WH3563> like the flower<WH6525> of a lily:<WH7799> it received<WH2388> and held<WH3557> three<WH7969> thousand<WH505> baths.<WH1324>

He made<WH6213> also ten<WH6235> basins,<WH3595> and put<WH5414> five<WH2568> on the right hand,<WH3225> and five<WH2568> on the left,<WH8040> to wash<WH7364> in them;<WH4639> such things as belonged to the burnt offering<WH4639> they washed<WH1740> in them;<WH3220> but the sea was for the priests<WH3548> to wash in.<WH7364>

He made<WH6213> the ten<WH6235> lampstands<WH4501> of gold<WH2091> according to the ordinance<WH4941> concerning them;<WH5414> and he set them in the temple,<WH1964> five<WH2568> on the right hand,<WH3225> and five<WH2568> on the left.<WH8040>

He made<WH6213> also ten<WH6235> tables,<WH7979> and placed<WH3240> them in the temple,<WH1964> five<WH2568> on the right side,<WH3225> and five<WH2568> on the left.<WH8040> He made<WH6213> one hundred<WH3967> basins<WH4219> of gold.<WH2091>

Furthermore he made<WH6213> the court<WH2691> of the priests,<WH3548> and the great<WH1419> court,<WH5835> and doors<WH1817> for the court,<WH5835> and overlaid<WH6823> their doors<WH1817> with brass.<WH5178>
He set<WH5414> the sea<WH3220> on the right<WH3233> side<WH3802> of the house eastward,<WH6924> toward<WH4136> the south.<WH5045>

Huram<WH2361> made<WH6213> the pots,<WH5518> and the shovels,<WH3257> and the basins.<WH4219> So Huram<WH2361> made<WH3615> an end of doing the work<WH4399> that he did<WH6213> for king<WH4428> Solomon<WH8010> in the house<WH1004> of God:<WH430>

the two<WH8147> pillars,<WH5982> and the bowls,<WH1543> and the two<WH8147> capitals<WH3805> which were on the top<WH7218> of the pillars,<WH5982> and the two<WH8147> networks to cover<WH3680> the two<WH8147> bowls<WH1543> of the capitals<WH3805> that were on the top<WH7218> of the pillars,<WH5982>

and the four<WH702> hundred<WH3967> pomegranates<WH7416> for the two<WH8147> networks;<WH7639> two<WH8147> rows<WH2905> of pomegranates<WH7416> for each<WH259> network,<WH7639> to cover<WH3680> the two<WH8147> bowls<WH1543> of the capitals<WH3805> that were on<WH6440> the pillars.<WH5982>
He made<WH6213> also the bases,<WH4350> and the basins<WH3595> made<WH6213> he on the bases;<WH4350>
one<WH259> sea,<WH3220> and the twelve<WH8147> oxen under it.<WH1241>

Huram<WH2361> his father<WH1> also made<WH6213> the pots,<WH5518> the shovels,<WH3257> the forks,<WH4207> and all its vessels<WH3627> for king<WH4428> Solomon<WH8010> for the house<WH1004> of Yahweh<WH3068> of bright<WH4838> brass.<WH5178>
The king<WH4428> cast<WH3332> them in the plain<WH3603> of the Jordan,<WH3383> in the clay<WH5645> ground<WH127> between Succoth<WH5523> and Zeredah.<WH6868>
Thus Solomon<WH8010> made<WH6213> all these vessels<WH3627> in great<WH3966> abundance:<WH7230> for the weight<WH4948> of the brass<WH5178> could not be found out.<WH2713>
Solomon<WH8010> made<WH6213> all the vessels<WH3627> that were in the house<WH1004> of God,<WH430> the golden<WH2091> altar<WH4196> also,<WH7979> and the tables with the show bread on them;<WH3899>
and the lampstands<WH4501> with their lamps,<WH5216> to burn<WH1197> according to the ordinance<WH4941> before<WH6440> the oracle,<WH1687> of pure<WH5462> gold;<WH2091>
and the flowers,<WH6525> and the lamps,<WH5216> and the tongs,<WH4457> of gold,<WH2091> and that perfect<WH4357> gold;<WH2091>

and the snuffers,<WH4212> and the basins,<WH4219> and the spoons,<WH3709> and the fire pans,<WH4289> of pure<WH5462> gold:<WH2091> and as for the entry<WH6607> of the house,<WH1004> the inner<WH6442> doors<WH1817> of it for the most<WH6944> holy<WH6944> place,<WH1817> and the doors of the main hall<WH1004> of the temple<WH1964> were of gold.<WH2091>
